message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but $150 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only afford up to $60.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $100.
Thanks for countering, Alice. I appreciate you working with me.  I could do $70, but that's really pushing my budget.
I appreciate your willingness to pay $70, Bob. However, I still need to get the minimum price I'm looking for. I can do $110, and that's as low as I can go.
